Nazlı Hanım öğretmen emeklisi,evli ve bir çocuğu var.  Nazlı Hanım öğretmenlik yıllarında el sanatlarına merak sarıyor ve çeşitli kurslara giderek bilgi ve becerisini arttırıyor.  Emekli olunca bir yer açıyor.  Halk eğitimle ortak kadınlara burada el işi kursları veriliyor.  Aynı zamanda burasını dükkana da çevirip el işi malzemeleri satışı yapıyor.  Kendisi  de orijinal takılar,çantalar ,Havlu ve pano işlemeleri yapıyor.  Nazlı Hanım aynı zaman da yaz aylarında  sahilde tezgah açıyor ve kendi elişlerini burada satışını yapıyor.  Nazlı Hanım sanat evini devredip sadece sahilde ki tezgahında iş yapmak istiyor.Çünkü bu şekilde daha çok zamanı olacak ve daha çok el sanatlarına vakit ayıracağını düşünüyor.

loans.use: to buy products

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru:
Эту 29-летнюю молодую женщину зовут Фируза. Она занимается собственным торговым бизнесом. Фируза на центральном рынке своего города Куляб имеет торговую точку, где она занимается продажей заколок, резинок, ободков, бижутерия и т.д. Данным бизнесом она занимается в течение 3 лет. Ее муж тоже бизнесмен. Он занимается купле-продажей фруктов. Фируза имеет троих детей. Ее дочерям по 9 и 4 года, а сыночку 2 годика.
Фируза хочет увеличить объем продаж в своей торговой точке и поэтому обратилась за кредитом. Она за счет кредита собирается разнообразить ассортимент товара.
texts.en:
This 29-year-old young woman's name is Firuza. She is involved in her own retail business. Firuza has a retail outlet at the central market of her city of Kulob, where she sells hair pins, ties, bands, jewelry, etc. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her husband is also a businessman. He is involved in reselling fruits. Firuza has three children. Her daughters are 9 and 4 years old, and her son is 2 years old.

Firuza wants to increase the volume of sales at her retail outlet and this is why she requested this loan. She plans to vary the selection of her merchandise with the help of this loan.

loans.use: to purchase a selection of hair pins, ties, bands, jewelry, etc. in order to increase the sales volume

loans.name: Doris

texts.en:
Doris appreciates the support of the previous loan that helped her to purchase herbal soaps for sale

She comes to you now requesting another loan of KES 50,000 to buy two cartons of herbal soaps to sell. She thanks Yehu and Kiva at large for the support

loans.use: to buy two cartons of herbal soaps to sell

loans.name: William

texts.en: William is a Ugandan married man living in Kagadi. He has four children aged between 10 and 2 and one attends school. He has been selling produce and earns from farming too. He hopes to grow his business despite poor roads that delay his service delivery. William is requesting a loan to buy maize, beans and ground nuts to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize, beans and ground nuts to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and prepare the land for the new crop

loans.name: Kurbonbiby

texts.ru: Трудное условие жизни заставляет человека направлять все свои усилия и мотивировать существующие ресурсы.   Курбонбиби является одним из таких личностей, которая старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка.  Курбонбиби решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес предоставлением услуги мастера по ремонту квартир, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует улучшить условию проживания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки оборудования для ремонтных работ, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Difficult life conditions force a person to direct all of her efforts and motivate existing resources. Kurbonbiby is one of these persons, who tries to improve life circumstances and stimulate the family's economic situation. She is married and raising one child. Kurbonbiby decided to help her husband for the family's welfare. With this goal, she completed the "Achieve Success" course, organized by the Association of Business Women, and obtained a certificate. Now she is well able to organize her own business and become successful in this field. She wants to start a business of providing apartment repair services because she has experience in this type of business. She plans to use the resulting income to improve her living conditions. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 5000 somoni to purchase equipment for repair work in order to start her business. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for repair work in order to start her business

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a female Kiva borrower. She has three children and describes herself as self oriented. She operates a retail business where she sells basins, cups and other items. She has been involved in this business for six years. Her business is located in an area with potential. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of enough stock. She will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy more stock of basins, cups and other items. Her business goal is to expand within five years. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of basins, cups and other items

loans.name: Mirna Cecilia

texts.es: Mirna de 40 años de edad es una mujer  muy trabajadora, responsable, honesta y humilde, con gran esfuerzo hace varios años empezó a trabajar en la agricultura sembrando maíz y frijol, hoy ha tenido buenos resultados ya que obtiene una buena cosecha que comercializa en los alrededores de la zona, posee mucha clientela pues sus productos son de muy buena calidad y lo vende a buen precio, Mirna vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, ella esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar los insumos necesarios para la siembra como lo son: abonos, fertilizantes, herbicidas, controles de plagas, etc. y también mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra en la fotografía y asi poder seguir con sus siembras y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mirna, age 40, is a very hardworking, responsible, honest, and humble woman. Several years ago, with great effort, she began working in agriculture; and today she has had good results, as she produces a good harvest that she sells in the areas around the zone. She has many customers, as her products are good quality, and she sells them at a good price. 

Mirna lives with her family in her own house. She is seeking a loan with Integral, with which she will be able to purchase the supplies that are necessary for planting, such as compost, fertilizer, herbicide, pest control, etc., and also improve the land that is shown in the photograph. This way, she will be able to continue sowing and giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase compost, fertilizer, herbicide, pest control, etc., and also improve the land.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 27 años de edad vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia , el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene 10 años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno está en un lugar accesible, apto para el cultivo y con suelo fértil, todo lo que produce lo comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles,  el cliente solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, herbicida, abono, herramienta, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía, El  tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena
texts.en:
The borrower is 27 years old and lives with his family in his own home. 

He grows corn and beans. He has been working in agriculture for ten years and has a lot of valuable experience that permits him to always obtain the best crops. His field is in an accessible place, suitable for cultivation, with fertile soil. Everything he grows he sells in the surrounding areas of the community. He already has many customers as people know that everything he sells is top quality at a good price. 

The borrower is asking for a loan from Integral so he can buy seed, herbicides, fertilizer, tools, etc., to improve the field shown in the photograph. He has good payment references and is sure he can pay the debt and at the same time offer his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy seed, herbicde, fertilizer, tools etc., to improve the land

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce sells fruit and green vegetables. She always struggles to improve her grocery stall, trying to sell more and save money in order to have a more formal establishment. Joyce is requesting for another loan to buy sacks of fruit and green vegetables to sell.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fruit and green vegetables to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To repair his home.

loans.name: Mikhail

texts.ru:
Михаил живет в Хусте и на жизнь зарабатывает тем, что сдает имеющееся у него в собственности помещение в аренду. Так он работает вот уже 16 лет. Собственный бизнес планирует вести и дальше, чтобы поддерживать двоих дочерей и помогать их семьям финансово. 
В КИВА Михаил обратился за тем, чтобы собрать средства для ремонта своего дома, который давно нужно поштукатурить. Дом у Михаила добротный, перестроенный. Однако его надо еще довести до ума, а именно поштукатурить и сделать внутреннюю отделку. Так как у Михаила закончились собственные сбережения, он обратился за дополнительной финансовой помощью.
texts.en: Mikhail lives in Khoost.  For 16 years has has earned a living by renting out properties.  He plans to continue to run his business in order to financially support his two daughters and their families.  Mikhail turned to Kiva for funds to repair his home, which has long needed to be plastered.  Mikhail's home was remodeled, and thus needs the plastering and the interior finished.  Because Mikhail has exhausted his own funds, he is appealing for financial assistance.

loans.use: to make home repairs

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru:
Светлане 57 лет. Она живет в Каховке. Она арендует ларек у администрации местного рынка, торгуя женской одеждой больших размеров, а именно реализуя кофты, брюки, костюмы. В торговле Светлана работает уже 19 лет, имеет достаточный опыт торговли, ходовой товар, постоянных клиентов и доступные среднестатистическому покупателю цены. 
Сумма в 30 000 гривен понадобилась Светлане для того, чтобы пополнить сезонный ассортимент брюк, шорт, бриджей, а также открыть новое направление и приобрести блузы, кофты больших размеров под реализацию. Для того, чтобы закупить необходимый товар Светлана запланировала поездку за ним.
texts.en: Svetlana is 57 years old and lives in Kahovka.  She rents a stall in the local market, where she sells plus-sized women's clothing, specifically cardigans, trousers, and suits.  Svetlana has worked in retail for 19 years, has a lot of retail experience and is a top seller.  She has regular customers and sells clothes at a price that is reasonable for the average customer.  Svetlana is seeking 30,000 Ukranian grivnas to purchase an assortment of seasonal pants and shorts.  She also hopes to go in a new direction with her store buy purchasing plus-size blouses and cardigans to sell.  Svetlana is planning a trip in order to buy necessary merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal shorts, pants, blouses and shirts

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
Amelia is a humble, hardworking, and honest mother of two children who has devoted much of her life to their care and protection. She works hard to earn income for her household caring for a chicken shed built on the side of her house. She then sells the chickens in the town of Rizal. This is her main source of income and this is why she devotes her time and effort towards it.

She is requesting a loan to make some adjustments to her barn and to work more comfortably and efficiently so her animals can be in top condition. She will purchase food for her chickens to help them grow healthier as well.

With the loan she can improve the lives of her family by working as she has done her whole life. She has full faith in the hearts of the caring people who support productive projects for humble and disadvantaged people.

loans.use: to buy materials like wood and nails for the expansion of her business

loans.name: Harun

texts.en:
Harun is a married man. He has two children. He describes himself to be committed. He operates a retail business where he sells clothes. He has been involved in this business for five years. His business is located in an area suited to the business and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. 

Harun will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes. His business goal is to be successful within five years. He will use the anticipated profits to improve the business further.

loans.use: to buy more  clothes for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, herbicides, etc., and at the same time to improve the land

loans.name: Zenon

texts.es: Zenon de 43 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, y esa así como se gana la vida honradamente, con su trabajo logra solventar cualquier gasto que se le presente en su hogar, Zenon  vive con su grupo familiar, él quiere seguir con sus siembras ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo pero no tiene de suficiente capital para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito y poder comprar los insumos necesarios como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas y también mejorar el terreno donde hace su siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía y asi poder seguirle dando a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Zenon is 43 years old and has been working in agriculture for several years planting corn and beans, and that is how he has earned an honest living. He is able to meet whatever household expenses that come up through his work. Zenon lives with his family.

He wants to continue farming as that is his only source of employment but he does not have enough money in order to do it and this is why he is asking for a loan to buy the necessary supplies such as: fertilizer, compost, pesticide, herbicide, and also to improve the land where he farms that is shown in the photograph so he can continue giving his family what they need without limitations.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, compost, pesticide, herbicide, and also to improve the land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more land for farming

loans.name: Antonina

texts.en:
Antonina has been operating her own fruit and vegetable stand for many years and she earns well from this. Having a big family requires more effort to provide for their needs, especially for her six children. The couple has had to work hard, with the determination of having better income to provide their children with better education than they currently have. 

To improve sales, Antonina would like to apply for a new loan to purchase additional fruit and vegetables. At an amount of PHP 50,000, she could already purchase more quantities and varieties of fruit, veggies and other items needed to expand her inventory. She also plans to add more quantities of snacks, seasonings and condiments for her additional income. She sincerely let you know her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

In the future, Antonina hopes to expand further. She dreams of a better life for her family, most especially for her children.

She meets with her co-fellowship members every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which she studies.

* All CCT community partners and/or clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim used the previous loan to buy clothes to sell. He operates a boutique and works 7 hours per day. 

In addition to the above, he has involved himself in farming and he cultivates bananas and maize. He sells to the women in the town and others from the neighborhood. He is aiming at having enough stock for his business even though he faces a shortcoming of limited capital.

Ibrahim needs a loan to buy a stock of clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more  clothes to sell.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith sells fruit and maize, beans, and rice. She always struggles to improve her cereal stall, trying to sell more and save money in order to have a more formal establishment. Judith is requesting a loan to buy sacks of wheat, rice, and maize for resale

loans.use: to buy sacks of wheat, rice, and maize  for resale

loans.name: Ivan

texts.en: Ivan is a 46-year-old married man with six children who all attend school. Ivan practices agriculture such as growing trees, fruits and vegetables and also sells coffee to earn additional income. Ivan started the business to get a daily source of income to support his family. Ivan wants money to buy loads of loam soil for his nursery beds. Weather changes and thieves are challenges he faces.

loans.use: To buy loam soil for his nursery beds.

loans.name: Fares

texts.en:
Fares is a 32-year-old married man with five children. His oldest child is 18 years old and the youngest one is seven years old. Fares has a University education. Recently, he runs a languages and computer institute in Sana'a, Yemen. In his institute, Fares has many employees. He is the general manager of the institute. A lot of the students come to his institution to learn languages and computers and  other sciences. The classrooms don't have enough chairs and tables. Also, the crisis with electricity these days impacts negatively on the work in the institute. As a result, Fares applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase more chairs and a power generator for the institute.

Fares looks forward to opening other branches in many places of the capital city of Sana'a.

loans.use: to purchase more chairs and a power generator for the institute.

loans.name: Mikhail

texts.ru:
Михаил — из Хуста, где он живет вместе с женой и двумя детьми. На жизнь он зарабатывает тем, что делает евроремонты на заказ, а именно кладет плитку, штукатурит и делает косметический ремонт. Бизнес планирует развивать и дальше, чтобы насобирать денежные средства, когда придет время учить детей. Михаил — очень пунктуальный, всегда умело рассчитывает доходы и расходы. 
В этот раз Михаил мечтает сделать полный ремонт теперь уже в собственном доме, улучшив тем самым условия проживания в своем жилище. Недавно он поменял сам все окна, но для окончания ремонтного процесса не хватает дополнительных средств. Михаил очень хотел бы поменять входные двери, положить плитку в коридоре и на кухне, а также сделать пол в жилых комнатах. Для осуществления своих планов ему потребуется сумма в 30 000 гривен.
texts.en: Mikhail is from Khoost, where he lives with his wife and two children.  He earns a living as a contractor, specifically doing tile work, plastering, and redecorating.  He plans to continue his business in order to save money for his children's education.  Mikhail is very punctual, and has always monitored his income and expenses.  Mikhail dreams of completely redoing his own house and improving the living conditions in his home.  Not long ago he changed all of the windows in his home, but he lacks the funds to finish the repair process.  Mikhail would really like to replace his doors, lay tile in the hallway and kitchen, and redo the floor in the living room.  The implementation of his plans requires a sum of 30,000 UAH.

loans.use: to make home repairs

loans.name: Tserenpeljee

texts.en:
Mr. Tserenpeljee is 40 years old and lives with his wife and two daughters, in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He is a taxi driver. He works in an Ulaanbaatar taxi service, and he enjoys transporting and serving people. He is hardworking and a loving father for his family.

He owns a piece of land, and he has built there 50% of his dream house. Now, he is requesting to borrow 2,600,000 MNT, which he will use to buy some necessary building materials to finish his house. If he finishes his house, thanks to you one more family will live in warmth and comfort. Let’s help this father and his family, dear Lenders!

loans.use: to buy some necessary building materials to finish building a house

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy canned food and staple food items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabrics and kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy beads

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio de 40 años de edad es muy amable y trabajador, vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, El trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maíz y maicillo; sus productos son de muy buena calidad comercializa sus productos  en  los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su lugar de residencia. Julio  solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plagas, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra, y también mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Julio is 40 years old. He is very friendly and hardworking. He lives with his family in his own home. He works very hard on his own farm where he grows corn and sorghum. His crops are very good quality. He sells them in different markets that are close to his home. 

Julio is asking for a loan from Integral in order to have the necessary capital to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies such as pesticide, fertilizer, compost, seed, and other things he needs to plant, and also to improve the land that is shown in the photograph. He is eager to increase his sales in order to have higher profits so he can give his family better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy pesticide, fertilizer, compost, seed, etc., and also to improve the land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more stocks of cereals to sell

loans.name: Erick

texts.en:
Erick is a hardworking married man living in Kagadi, Uganda. He deals in alcohol selling and farming to generate more income to support his family. He hopes to grow his business despite the challenge of poor roads. 

Erick is requesting a loan to buy more jerry cans of local brew for selling.

loans.use: to buy more jerry cans of local brew for selling.

loans.name: Rene Everardo

texts.es: René de 45 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto con su grupo familiar conformado por su esposa y sus tres hijos, él es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica desde hace 20 años a ser agricultor siembra maíz y maicillo, René desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas, entre otros, y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
René is 45 years old. He is a very responsible man with his household obligations. He is always known for providing the best for his family. He lives with his family made up of his wife and three children. He is very hardworking, always displaying joy and enthusiasm. He has been working twenty years farming corn and sorghum.

René wants to increase his sales and this is why he visited the offices of Integral to ask for a loan to buy: compost, fertilizer, pesticide, herbicide, and more, and to improve the land that is shown in the photograph. He needs the requested help as he has no other cash income, and so he can continue earning the daily bread for his household without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizer, pesticide, herbicide, and more, and to improve the land

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits and maize.

loans.name: Sandra Veronica

texts.es: Sandra de 31  años de edad vive junto a su familia en casa propia, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, tiene mucha clientela que la prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; ella necesita invertir por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, insecticida, fertilizantes, abonos, herbicida, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía. La clienta tiene buenas referencias por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Sandra is 31 years old and lives with her family in their own home. She works growing corn and sorghum. She has been farming for several years and this has given her a lot of experience that permits her to obtain the best crops. She has a lot of customers that prefer her because of the quality, the good prices, and above all for her good service.

She needs to invest and this is why she is asking for a loan to buy seed, insecticide, fertilizer, herbicide, etc., and to improve the land that is shown in the photograph. She has good references from those who know her, and she is very responsible, and is sure that she can pay off the debt according to plan and at the same time confident she can provide household financial security.

loans.use: to buy seed, insecticide, fertilizer, compost, herbicide, etc., and to improve the land

loans.name: Natividad De Jesus

texts.es: Natividad de 58 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles, ella quiere invertir en insumos agrícolas  por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, controles de plagas,  herramienta, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía,  Doña Natividad tiene buenas referencias de pago y está seguro que podrá saldar su deuda a tiempo, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen
texts.en:
Natividad is 58 years old and lives with her family. She is engaged in  agriculture, specifically farming corn and sorghum. She has many years of valuable experience in this field that allows her to obtain the best crops. She sells in all the surrounding areas and has many regular customers, as these people always prefer her crops for the quality and really affordable prices.

She wants to invest in agricultural supplies and this is why she is asking for a loan through Integral to permit her to buy seed, compost, insecticide, fertilizer, pesticide, tools, etc., and to improve the land shown in the photograph. Natividad has good payment references and is sure that she can pay her debt on time, and at the same time confident that she can give her family the life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy seed, compost, insecticide, fertilizer, pesticide, tools, etc., and to improve the land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer for her son to use in his studies

loans.name: Carlos Humberto

texts.es:
Carlos de 37 años de edad,  estudio hasta primer grado,  comenta que sus padres no lo pusieron a estudiar debido a que no contaban con los recursos económicos para que él continuara con sus estudios, actualmente está casado vive en su casa junto a su esposa y dos de sus hijas, ya que la primera de ellas se casó de las que viven con él una estudia 8° grado y la otra esta en kínder, su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar y a cuidar una pequeña granja de pollos que poseen como familia. 
	
Carlos se dedica  a trabajar como barrendero en la ciudad donde el reside, él se ha dedicado a este trabajo desde hace 3 años su horario de trabajo inicia a las 6:30 de la mañana y termina a las 3:30 de la tarde,  él tiene que trasladarse a pie desde su casa hasta la alcaldía donde labora tiene que caminar un kilómetro por la mañana y uno por la tarde,  cuando regresa esto es toda la semana, además de esto él tiene 4 años de tener una pequeña granja de pollos,  la cual durante los últimos tres años ha sido administrada por su esposa, él también se dedica a trabajar la agricultura en los momentos de la semana cuando tiene tiempo siempre cultiva 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz para llevarles el sustento a su familia y así ya no tiene que comprar el grano.

Con el crédito el comprara venenos y fertilizantes para aplicarlos a sus cultivos, ya que comprándolos de una sola vez,  podrá tenerlos a tiempo para realizar la aplicación a las plantas, así espera tener una buena producción de granos básicos.

Él quiere para su futuro construir una mejor infraestructura de su casa para vivir cómodamente con su familia en un lugar digno para ellos y también desea tener una buena producción de granos básicos para tener seguro el sustento de su familia, desea darles a sus hijas el estudio que a él le fue negado por las condiciones económicas con las que sus padres contaban en su niñez.
texts.en:
Carlos, 27 years old, studied until the first grade. He says that his parents did not put him through school because they did not have the financial resources for him to continue schooling. He is currently married, lives at home with his wife and with two of his daughters, since the eldest daughter already got married. Of the two that live with him, one studies in the 8th grade and the other is in kindergarten. His wife devotes herself to being a housewife and tends to a small chicken farm that they own as a family.
	
Carlos works as a street sweeper in the city where he lives. He has devoted himself to this job for the last three years. His workday begins at 6:30 in the morning and ends at 3:30 in the afternoon. He has to travel on foot from his home to the neighborhood where he works. He needs to walk a kilometer in the morning and one in the afternoon every day of the week. 

For the last four years, he has also had a small chicken farm, which for the last three years has been tended to by his wife. He also works in agriculture when he is able to devote time during the week. He grows 7,000 square meters of corn to bring the harvest to his family and that way he no longer needs to buy grain.

With the loan he will buy pesticides and fertilizers to apply to his harvests. By buying them all at once, he will be able to apply them to the plants on time and that way he expects to have a good production of basic grains.

For his future, he wants to build a better infrastructure for his home to live comfortably with his family in a decent place and also wishes to have a good production of basic grains to ensure sustenance for his family. He also wishes to give his daughters the schooling that he was denied due to his parent's financial conditions during his childhood.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and fertilizers to  apply to his fields.

loans.name: Aigulya

texts.ru: Айгуле 26 лет, замужем, воспитывает 3 детей. У Айгули среднее образование, с детства она усердно занималась сельским хозяйством, но свой бизнес начала с 2008 года, у нее почти не было стартового капитала, однако на сегодняшний день в хозяйстве у Айгули есть 1 дойная корова, 1 теленок и 2,00 ГА земли, где в прошлом году Айгуля сажала кукурузу и пшеницу, однако в этом году планирует выращивать хлопок. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сомов (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айгуля обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS) на покупку минеральных удобрений и ядохимикатов для обработки земли. Данные мероприятия позволят увеличить доход и дадут возможность накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Aigulya is 26 years old, married, and is raising 3 children.  Aigulya has a secondary education, and has worked tirelessly from childhood in agriculture.  When she began working for herself in 2008, she almost didn't have enough funds to start her business.  She now has to her name 1 milk cow, 1 calf, and 2.0 hectares of land, on which she planted corn and wheat last year.  This year, however, Aigulya plans to grow cotton.  Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS.  With the goal of further expanding her business, Aigulya turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 15,000 KGS to purchase fertilizer and pesticides to cultivate the land.  This will allow her to increase her income and will give her the chance to save money towards home repairs.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clean and thermally efficient cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Rapheal

texts.en: Rapheal is a 43-year-old, married man, who has five children. All of his children go to school. Rapheal operates a retail shop with general merchandise, on a busy street. He began the business in order to pay school fees for his children. Rapheal wants money to buy sand and cement, with which to complete his house and achieve his dream. He is an honest person who meets challenges of limited capital and price fluctuations, which delay his business growth.

loans.use: to buy sand and cement to complete his house.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a married woman. She has four children. She describes herself as determined. She operates a farm, where she keeps dairy cows for milk production and also grows tomatoes. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her business is located in a good area, and her primary customers are individuals and hotels. She says her biggest business challenge is a lack of financing. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to hire more land, for farming purposes. Her business goal is to be a successful farmer within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to rent more land for farming purposes

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
El valor, la buena conducta y la perseverancia son las principales cualidades que han llevado al éxito a doña Adela, quién hace 20 años inició en el negocio de la venta de comida. Tiene 75 años, está casada y tiene 12 hijos, todos mayores e independientes. A diario prepara los platillos más deliciosos de todo el barrio, no hay vecino que se resiste al olor y sabor de las delicias que esta señora prepara. Recibe el apoyo de todos y cada uno de sus familiares, asegura que la unión hace la fuerza.
Ella solicita el crédito para aumentar la producción de su trabajo, requiere comprar granos básicos, como arroz y frijoles; aceite, carne de res, pollo, y cerdo; verduras, condimentos, entre otros. Ella deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que anhela incrementar su clientela y al mismo tiempo su ganancia, lo que le permitirá mejorar las condiciones de su hogar. A pesar de su edad, Adela planea seguir trabajando, definitivamente es una mujer inteligente y trabajadora, una de sus metas es establecer una pulpería.
texts.en:
Courage, good conduct, and perseverance are the main qualities that have brought Adela success.  Twenty years ago, she started her business selling food.  She is 75 years old, married, and has twelve children, who are all independent adults.  Every day she prepares the most delicious meals in the neighborhood.  None of her neighbors can resist the scent and flavor of the delicacies that she makes.  She has the support of all of her relatives and she is sure there is strength in numbers.

She is requesting this loan to increase her production.  She needs to purchase basic grains, including rice and beans, oil, beef, chicken, pork, vegetables, condiments, and other items.  She is putting her trust in the loan since she hopes to increase her customer base and her profits, which will allow her to improve the condition of her home.  In spite of her age, Adela plans to continue working.  She is an intelligent and hardworking woman.  One of her dreams is to open a grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, including rice and beans, oil, beef, chicken, pork, vegetables, and condiments.

loans.name: Verónica Marbely

texts.es:
Verónica de 19 años de edad, se dedica a los oficios del hogar, ella estudio hasta 7° grado dejo de estudiar, ya que se fue para la capital a trabajar para ayudarles a sus padres en los ingresos del hogar, actualmente está casada su esposo se dedica a trabajar la agricultura con él han procreado una hija quien tiene 9 meses de edad, tanto ella como el esposo son muy entregados a su hogar actualmente ella vive con los suegros.
	
Verónica actualmente se dedica a los oficios del hogar y a cuidar a su bebe mientras que su esposo se dedica a trabajar todos los días en la agricultura,  ella antes de tener a su bebe se dedicaba a los oficios del hogar trabajando en la capital; pero hoy porque tiene que cuidar a su hija no puede trabajar como ella quisiera, cuando su bebe ya esté más grande pretende retomar su trabajo, pero en la zona donde reside para ayudarle a su esposo a llevar un ingreso extra a su casa y también para no alejarse tanto tiempo de su nueva familia.

Con el crédito ella comprara arena, cemento, hierro y bloques para la construcción de su casa, debido a  que ella y su esposo se quieren independizar y están comenzando a construir su casa, comprando todo de una sola vez, ella tendrá un ahorro en el pago de transporte ya que donde ella vive es un lugar muy aislado y quiere aprovechar el viaje haciendo una sola compra y un solo traslado de material para comenzar la construcción y de esta manera darle a su hija una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Verónica is 19 years old and works doing the housework. She studied until Grade 7 and quit her studies to go to the capital to work to help her parents make income for the household. She is married, her husband is a farmer. They have a nine month old baby.

Both her and her husband are very devoted to their household as actually she lives with her in-laws. Verónica takes care of the housework and cares for the baby while her husband works every day at farming. Before she had her baby she worked doing housework in the capital. But now as she has to care for her baby she can't work as she would like to. When the baby is bigger she wants to return to her work, but close to where they live in order to help her husband bringing an extra income into the household. She doesn't want to be away from her new family for a long time.

She will buy sand, re-bar, cement and cinder blocks with the loan to build their house. They want to live independently and are starting to construct their house. They want to buy everything at one time so she can save money on the transportation costs as she lives in a very isolated area. She wants to make just one trip to take advantage of paying once to transport the material to start construction and in this way provide a better quality of living for her daughter.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, re-bar and cinder blocks to build her house.

loans.name: Vjonis

texts.en:
Vjonis is a 33-year-old, married father of two little girls. His daughters are four and three years old.

Vjonis works as a driver in a company, and his wife works as a cook in a nearby restaurant. Their pays are very small and have not allowed them to put aside enough money for the rainy days. This is the reason that now they are requesting a loan, in an amount of 100,000 Albanian Lek. They will use the loan to repair their leaking roof. In their city of Korca, in the southeastern part of Albania, there are some months that it rains non-stop, and it snows from November until the end of March. Vjonis puts buckets inside the room when it rains, so that the water goes into the buckets, instead of on the floor.

Kindly note, that Vjonis will very much appreciate your financial help. He wishes everyone 'good summer.’ This will be his second loan with VisionFund Albania.

loans.use: to repair the leaking roof of his family's little home

loans.name: Bojan

texts.en:
Bojan comes from a minority community and has three children between the ages of 4 and 11 years old. He works as a waiter in a restaurant while his wife stays home and cares for the children and the house. Like most families in the minority communities, Bojan’s family lives in poor and bad conditions in a home that needs improvements. 

Since he wants to give his family good living conditions and a better quality of life, he will need to take out a loan to complete repairs and improve their environment. He wants to thank all of the lenders.

loans.use: To renovate his house

loans.name: Bojana

texts.en: Bojana is 30 years old and comes from a minority community where she lives with her husband, her three children and the rest of her family in the same house. She is a housewife while her husband works in a school. As with most families in minority communities, she lives in very poor and bad conditions in an old and small house that needs repair. At one time, they started to renovate the toilet, but could not finish it because of the lack of money. Now, she is requesting a loan in order to façade the house and finish the renovation of the toilet. This help is very welcome and she really appreciates the support. She wants to thank all of the lenders.

loans.use: To façade the house and finish the renovation of the toilet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy 30 American Eagle sport shirts.

loans.name: Ismoil

texts.ru: Исмоил является малым предпринимателем из района Кубадиён. Ему 50 лет. Он рядом с домом имеет собственный цех по производству муки. Жители его села и близлежащих деревень постоянно обращаются к его услугам для измельчения своих пшениц. Исмоил занимается производством муки на протяжении 6 лет. Теперь когда у него достаточный опыт он решил расширить свой малый бизнес. Он хочет предоставлять еще дополнительную услугу, а именно - перерабатывать рис. Поскольку электричество в их районе низкое и часто отключается, Исмоил также планирует купить генератор для энергоснабжения своего цеха. Однако для осуществления цели Исмолу нужны заемные средства, так как собственного сбережения не хватает. Он запрашивает кредит в размере 4000 долларов США для приобретения оборудования по переработке риса, а также генератора. Благодаря кредиту он сможет приобрести эти оборудования и его бизнес станет еще успешнее и прибыльнее. Он надеется на финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Ismoil is from Qubadiyon and has a small business. He is 50 years old and has his own flour mill close to home. Residents of his village and the surrounding area visit him in order to grind their wheat. He has been in this business for 6 years. Now that he has plenty of experience, he has decided to expand his small business. He wants to provide an additional service--namely, processing rice. Because electricity in his area is low and frequently cuts out, he also plans to buy a generator to supply power to his shop. Ismoil needs a loan because he does not have enough money. He is requesting a loan of $4000 to buy the equipment to process rice in addition to a generator. Thanks to the loan he will be able to purchase this equipment and his business will grow more successful and more profitable. He hopes for financial support.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for rice production and a generator to supply power to his shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction materials such as purlins, sheet metal roofing, cement, sand, gravel and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Balloons Group

texts.en:
Rihab is the featured borrower of Balloons group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua because they have always been neighbors and friends. Their acquired loans are normally invested in developing their living by increasing their income.

Rihab is a 43-year-old married mother of two. She has been working at preparing and decorating special events for the last 12 years to support her beloved husband to cover their family's increasing needs, especially their children's tuition fees. With her loan, she will  increase her business merchandise with special released special events themes and needs to stay up to date with her customers' requests, which will increase her income and develop her business more and more. She hopes to stay the number one in her region and expand her working sector to wider regions in the future
.
Rihab is the lady standing at the center of the picture wearing red.  As for the other group members, Rand is the lady standing on the far left side of the picture with a striped black and white top while Ghofran is the lady on the far right side of the picture with a brick-colored top.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise with special event themes

loans.name: Romelia

texts.es:
Romelia es de la ciudad de Pilar, es dueña de una mercería, se dedica a esta actividad hace más de 6 años conjuntamente con su marido, es una pareja que se está ayudando para poder crecer y salir adelante.
Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que se está esforzando por poder abrirse camino y de esa forma dar a su familia una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas, calzados, artículos de bazar y demás productos para poder surtir su negocio, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas y luchando por poder crecer.
texts.en:
Romelia is from city of Pilar. She owns a sewing supplies store and has been engaged in this business for more than six years together with her husband. This is a couple who are helping themselves to grow and move forward in life.

She is a very hard-working and enterprising person who is doing her best to be able to make her way in life and in that way give her family a decent life without hardships.

She is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the purchase of articles of clothing, footwear, notions and other products for stocking her business, and that way be able to continue with her sales and striving to grow.

loans.use: To buy articles of clothing, footwear, notions, and other products to stock her sewing supplies store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new computer for her daughter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer for her son.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is a daycare worker and a wife of motorcycle driver with two children of school age, and they live at Barangay Manga, Tangub City, Philippines. 

From the transportation business, she earns approximately PHP 8,000.00 each month. Elsie requests a loan to fully pay for the motorcycle. In the future, Elsie wants to earn more for her two children to support their education and give them a better future someday.

loans.use: to fully pay for the motorcycle

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace owns and operates a variety store business to earn a living. She has been successful in this business for six years, and she repaid her previous loan used for the business. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their family.

Relative to this, Grace would like to take a new loan to increase her product inventory. She is requesting an amount of 10,000 PHP to buy more quantity and variety of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

In the future, she hopes that she will become more enthusiastic in managing and growing her business. She also dreams for a forever happy family.

She meets with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and study the Word of God.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro finance loans.

loans.use: to buy inventory for her store.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
This is Imelda. She has been operating her own “sari-sari” (variety) store, carinderia (mini-restaurant) and internet shop for more than two years, and she profits well from this. Having a bigger responsibility requires more effort to provide for her family's needs, especially for her children. She and her partner had to work hard, determined to have a better income, to provide their children with a better education.

To improve sales, Imelda would like to apply for a new loan to purchase additional grocery goods to sell. At an amount of 30,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos), she could already purchase larger quantities and more varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. She sincerely lets you know her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

In the future, Imelda hopes to maintain an increasing profit from her business. She dreams for her family to be always happy and healthy.

She meets up with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God, which she studies.

*All CCT (Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 45 years old. She will use her Kiva loan to pay labor costs and buy fertilizer during rice production. She needs to buy fertilizer in order to increase her production. With profits from her farming, she wishes to invest in her business so that in the future, she can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance her farming capacity.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more fertilizers and pay labor costs during rice production.

loans.name: Beathe

texts.en:
Beathe is 36 years old. She is married with four children. She will use this Kiva loan to support labor costs and to buy fertilizer during rice production: she needs to buy fertilizer in order to increase production. With profits from her farming business, she wishes to invest in her business so that in the future she can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance her farming capacity.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizer and to support labor costs during rice production.

loans.name: José Armando

texts.es:
José de 64 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, sus padres no lo pusieron a estudiar debido a que no contaban con los recursos económicos y en lugar de eso mejor lo pusieron a trabajar para que les ayudara a tener ingresos en el hogar y de esta manera que les ayudara a sus hermanos menores a superarse académicamente, actualmente está casado vive en su casa junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los oficios del hogar, viven con ellos un hijo quien ya termino de estudiar bachillerato y es quien les ayuda a realizar los trabajos agrícolas junto a su padres.

José se dedica a cultivar la tierra,  siembra maíz y frijol para el consumo de su familia, también posee ganado con el  cual comercializa los lácteos que procesa de ellos,  él se dedica a la agricultura desde que era un niño fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaron a realizar este tipo de trabajos, él sale de su casa a las 5:00 am y regresa pasadas las 2:00 pm a pesar de su edad  siente que aún tiene las fuerzas necesarias para seguir trabajando junto a su hijo para llevar los granos a su casa así como para seguir cuidando a su ganado.

Con el crédito comprara un terreno, el cual está junto a su casa y es un lugar con tierra fértil para cultivar hortalizas, teniendo el dinero en la mano, podrá realizar la compra rápido y así asegurara un lugar más donde podrá cultivar hortalizas,  para cuando tenga la producción poder venderlas y tener un ingreso de dinero extra en su familia.  

Él quiere para su futuro construir una mejor infraestructura de su casa para vivir cómodamente con su familia en un lugar digno para ellos y también desea tener una buena producción de granos básicos para tener seguro el sustento de su familia, siente que con la compra que está realizando el podrá tener el lugar idóneo para cultivar hortalizas y cuando las venda con las ganancias que adquiera podrá ir realizando las mejoras a su casa, también desea que su hijo forme un hogar lleno de amor en el cual pueda ver crecer a sus nietos y jugar con ellos, así como enseñarles a trabajar muy duro para que ellos sepan cómo desempeñar un oficio cuando crezcan.
texts.en:
José, age 64, studied up until the first grade. His parents could not send him to school because they did not have the economic resources. Instead, they put him to work so that he could help them to have an income for the home, and in this way, help his younger brothers to excel academically. He is married, and he lives in his house with his wife, who works as a housekeeper.  One child, who has already completed high school, lives with them and helps them with the farm work.

José cultivates the land, sowing corn and beans for family consumption, and he also has cows, from which he processes and sells dairy products. He has been working in agriculture since he was a little boy, as his parents taught him to carry out this kind of work.  He leaves his house at 5:00 A.M. and he returns after 2:00 P.M. In spite of his age, he feels that he still has the strength that is necessary to continue working with his son to provide food for his home, as well as caring for his cows. 

With the loan, he will buy a plot of fertile land that is next to his house, in order to grow vegetables. Having the money in hand, he will be able to make the purchase quickly, and thus be assured of another site where he will be able to grow vegetables, so that when he has the produce, he will be able to sell it and have extra income for his family.

For his future, he wants to build a better infrastructure for his house, so that he might live comfortably with his family in a decent place, and he also wants to have a good production of basic grains in order to assure his family's sustenance. He feels that with the purchase that he is making he will be able to have the ideal site for growing vegetables; and with the earnings that he would obtain he will be able continue improving his home. He also wants his son to make a home that is full of love, in which he could play with his  grandchildren and watch them grow, as well as teach them to work very hard, so that they will know how to engage in a profession when they grow up.

loans.use: to purchase a fertile plot of land that is next to his house in order to grow vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chicken, sausage, bread, sauces, corn, pork rind, cheese, beans, drinks, water etc. to better supply her snack stand

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is a single woman with three children. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

She has operated a retail business for the past two years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business.

With the loan, she is requesting of 10,000 KES, she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour.

loans.name: Consolee

texts.en:
Consolee is 40 years old. She will use this Kiva loan to support labor costs and to buy fertilizer during rice production: she needs to buy fertilizer in order to increase crop production. With profits from her farming, she wishes to invest in her business so that in the future she can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance her farming capacity.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizer and to support labor costs during rice production.

loans.name: Dashpiljee

texts.en: Mr. Dashpiljee, 44 years old, lives with his wife and three daughters in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. He has been working at a steel factory since 2000 and before this job, he was a cook at a restaurant. His wife is unemployed and stays at home looking after their youngest daughter. Their eldest daughter just graduated from her university and got an invitation from a Japanese university for further study. So he is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to pay for his daughter's accommodation fees and other expenses. As a result, his eldest daughter can study without worry and come back with a valuable education.

loans.use: to pay for his daughter's university accommodation fees and other expenses

loans.name: Virgen De La Asuncion Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Virgen de la Asuncion, están en su segundo ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde las 17 mujeres son muy trabajadoras, y quieren mejorar sus vidas a través del esfuerzo en conjunto.
Una persona digna de destacar es Olga, quien es vendedora de asaditos (churrascos), si bien es un trabajo humilde, por medio de este tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia. Ella sueña con poder tener un local de comidas donde poder trabajar y tener aun mayor clientela. Es una persona muy sacrificada y luchadora.
Olga pide este préstamo para comprar insumos para hacer sus asaditos, como ser carne, condimentos, mandioca, panificados, aderezos, y palitos de brochet, con los que podrá seguir trabajando y haciendo los productos que vende. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
This group is called Virgen de la Asuncion. They are in their second cycle of the village bank program, where the 17 women are very hardworking. They want to improve their lives by working together.

One dignified person to highlight is Olga, who is a grilled meats (churrascos) seller. Though it's a humble job, by this she has the means to be able to help her family. She dreams of being able to have a food store where she can work and have even more customers. She is a very sacrificing and fighting person.

Olga is asking for this loan to buy supplies to make her grilled meats, like meat, condiments, manioc, baked goods, dressings, and skewer sticks. With these, she will be able to continue working and making the products she sells. She is thankful for this opportunity she's receiving and it will be of much help.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, manioc, baked goods, dressings, and skewer sticks.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El Sr. Pedro tiene 46 años, es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, proviene de una familia de agricultores, sus padres se dedican a la plantación agrícola y  compra  ventas de ganados en general.
Se animó y con la ayuda de su familia se independizo, y en el año 2005 montó su propio taller mecánico con ventas de repuestos de algunas piezas, comenta que le va muy bien en su local y que ya gano muy buena clientela. Es una persona muy trabajadora que con gran sacrificio y esfuerzo está saliendo adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de repuestos varios para poder venderlos en su taller, y de esa forma seguir luchando y trabajando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Sr. Pedro is 46-years old.  He is a native of Coronel Oviedoa and comes from a family of farmers.  His parents make their living farming and buying and selling general livestock. 
Pedro was motivated to go out on his own and did so with the help of his family.  In 2005 he opened his own mechanic's shop where he sells various spare parts.  He says that it's going very well for him in his shop and that he has a very good clientele.  Pedro is a very hard-working person who, with a lot of sacrifice and hard work, is getting ahead. 
Pedro is requesting this loan to invest it in the purchase of various spare parts to resell in his shop.  This will allow him to keep working hard, as he is doing now.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts to sell in his shop.

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en: Tabitha sells fruits and green vegetables. She always struggles to improve her grocery stall, trying to sell more and save money for the expansion of her business. Tabitha is requesting a loan to buy sacks of fruits and green vegetables for resale.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fruits and green vegetables for resale

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a married man. He has two children. He describes himself to be motivated. He operates a restaurant where he cooks food and tea to sell. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the lack of capital. He will use the KES 24,000 loan to buy more stock of ingredients for preparing food to sell. His business goal is to own a big business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will live a good life. This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. His previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of ingredients for preparing food to sell

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a married woman with six children. When asked, she describes herself as determined.

For the past five years Alice has run a farm where she keeps dairy cows for milk production and grows vegetables as well. Her farm is located in a good area, and she sells to individuals. A lack of capital is her biggest challenge to developing her farm.

This will be Alice’s first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. She is applying for a 20,000 KES loan to lease more land for vegetable farming. Her goal is to see her farm thrive.

loans.use: lease more land for vegetable farming

loans.name: Jaquiline

texts.en:
Jaquiline has operated a tailoring business making garments for both men and women. She cites seasonality as her major challenge. Jaquiline dreams of establishing a tailoring school in the future.

With the KES 20,000, she wants to purchase cloth materials and sewing threads for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials and sewing threads for her business

loans.name: Mt Ulunguru Group

texts.en:
Rose is in her forties and has three children who go to school. She is a married woman and supports her family with a poultry business (layer). She grows up to 280 chickens now.  This is the benefit she experienced from Kiva, since she was growing only 200 chickens before. Rose also sells beauty products such as lotions and other cosmetics door to door. She has been in these projects for a period of four years now and is able to make a fair monthly profit. She runs her business from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm daily.

This is her 16th loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans (all of which were paid back successfully) to increase laying chickens (200 to 280) and bought beauty items to resell. She is so proud with Kiva's support. Rose earned a profit which she used to cover school fees, home food expenses and saved for an investment purpose (to open her new retail shop). With her 16th loan, she will use it to open her new project of retail shop (to purchase sacks of sugar,cooking oil, maize and baking flour, etc.). In the coming years, Rose would like to improve her life and build a nice family house. 

She will share this loan with her loan group "Mt Ulunguru", which totals two members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to open a retail shop and purchase sacks of sugar, cooking oil, maize and baking flour etc.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Maria tiene la edad de 47 años, es madre soltera de 2 hijos y de los cuales solo uno de ellos esta estudiando en un colegio tecnico la carrera de Agronomia. Ella es una persona alegre, honesta, emprendedora, una mujer de fe y con sueños y metas a corto plazo por cumplir. Maria labora para una institucion del estado desde hace 25 años y en donde se desempeña como Responsable de Registro Civil.Ella a recibido varios prestamos en donde los ha invertido en su casa de habitacion, ya que uno de sus sueños poder terminar de realizarle las mejoras y de esta forma dar una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo.
texts.en: Maria is 47 years old. She is a single mother of two children, of which only one of them is studying in the technical college with a concentration in Agronomy. She is a very cheerful, honest and enterprising woman, a woman of faith with dreams and short-term goals to achieve. Maria has worked for a state institution since she was 25 years old, where she serves as the head of the Civil Registry. She has received various loans which she has invested in her house, since one of her dreams is to complete home improvements and in this way provide a better quality of life to her son.

loans.use: to buy cement and ceramics

loans.name: Alice

texts.en: Alice is a 61-year-old married woman. She has nine children. She describes herself to be ambitious. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a good area. She describes her biggest business challenge to be financial problems. She will use the KES 90,000 loan to buy more stock of cereals. Her business goal is to become a better business lady within five years. She will use the anticipated profits to expand the business further. She also does farming.

loans.use: to buy more stock of cereals

loans.name: Kyamukube Bakyara Nabasaija Tweyimukye Group.

texts.en:
Kyamukube Bakyara Nabasaija Tweimukye Group is comprised of twenty members who each guarantees the others’ loan obligations since the group doesn’t pledge with securities. The group took out a previous loan, and Jane, the group’s featured member, used her portion of the loan to buy fresh food and produce to sell. She also farms. One of her challenges is the high cost of transporting her produce to her customers.

Kyamukube Bakyara Nabasaija Tweimukye is applying for a 8,100,000 UGX loan through HOFOKAM. Jane will use her portion to buy additional stocks of maize and soya flour, plus sugar to sell. She hopes to earn enough money to educate her children to university level.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of maize and soya flour, plus sugar to sell.

loans.name: Florida

texts.en:
Florida is 44-years-old. He will use his Kiva loan to support labor costs and fertilizer during rice production.  He needs to buy fertilizer in order to increase his production. With profits from his farming, he wishes to invest in his business so that in the future he can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance his farming capacity.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain under served by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more fertilizers and support labor costs during rice production.

loans.name: Ryadh

texts.en:
Ryadh is a 25-year-old married man with three children.  Ryadh lives with his family in their own house in Sana'a, Yemen. He studied until secondary school, but he couldn't complete his studies. He is a very dynamic and vigorous man.  He works in his grocery store which is located in his area. This business is the sole source of income for the family.  The income of this business is small. Rayadh and his family live in a very small house. He can't afford this condition. He wants to make his house larger and more comfortable, but he doesn't have enough money to do that. As a result, Ryadh is requesting a loan of 195,000 YER from AMB. He will use the loan to purchase construction materials such as cement and bricks in order to expand his small house.

Ryadh's dream in the future is to build more of one floor and renovate it. He hopes to expand his business more through opening other groceries in the capital city.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials, such as cement and bricks, to expand his small house.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia es casada y tiene dos hijos ella vive en El Alto y se dedica a ser artesana, vende mantas de vicuña y de lana Virginia necesita un prestamo para comprar lana de vicuña Virgnia Por el momento Virginia es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar y necesita su ayuda para poder vivir mejor
texts.en: Virginia is married and has two children. She lives in El Alto and makes a living as an artisan. She sells blankets made of vicuña [an animal similar to the alpaca prized for its soft hair] and from wool. Virginia needs a loan to buy vicuña wool. At the moment Virginia is the only source of income in her household and she needs your help to be able to live a better life.

loans.use: to buy vicuña wool

loans.name: Exalta

texts.es: Exalta vive en concubinato y tiene un hijo Exalta vive en la comunidad de Chijipina Grande en una casa de adobe que es de su propiedad Exalta se dedica a la elaboracion de quesos  y necesita un prestamo para comprar una vaca lechera, de esa manera se incrementará su produccion de leche y Exalta producira más quesos El esposo de Exalta le ayuda, trabaja como albañil pero lo que la familia gana no alcanza por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Exalta lives in a common law marriage and has one son. Exalta lives in the community of Chijipina Grande in an adobe house which is her property. Exalta makes a living making cheese and needs a loan to buy a dairy cow. In this way she will increase her production of milk and Exalta will produce more cheese. Exalta's husband helps her and works as a bricklayer but what the family earns is not enough and for this reason she needs your help.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase bags of cashew.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana Maria es una joven emprendedora, tiene 28 años de edad y vive en Yarinacocha junto a sus padres y su hijo.
Desde hace más de 1 año trabaja como Docente en un Jardin de niños y le va muy bien porque es una persona muy responsable, carismática, amable y trabajadora. A pesar de ser madre soltera ella pudo salir adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación para poder brindarle un mejor futuro a su hijo.
Ana Maria está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar un juego de sala y un juego de dormitorio para que su familia pueda sentirse más cómoda en su vivienda y así ella podrá seguir luchando para conseguir su más grande sueño: “Ser una empresaria exitosa”.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is an enterprising young woman who is 28 years old and lives in Yarinacocha together with her parents and her son. For more than one year she has worked as a teacher in a kindergarten and it has gone well for her because she is a very responsible, charismatic, kind and hardworking person.

Despite being a single mother she was able to get ahead with much effort and dedication, to be able to provide a better future for her son. Ana Maria is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the help they have given her she will be able to buy a living room set and a bedroom set so her family will feel more comfortable in their home and she will in this way be able to continue struggling to achieve her greatest dream: "To be a successful businesswoman."

loans.use: to buy a living room and bedroom set

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy staple foods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase haberdashery items and rice.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia es una mujer de 40 años de edad,  y con un hijo de 19 años, ella vive en la localidad de batallas  a dos horas de la ciudad de la Paz y se dedica a la producción de leche actividad que viene realizando desde que era niña pues esta activad le enseño su mama, su hijo termino sus estudios secundarios y ahora se encuentra en el cuartel militar “mi hijo es el primero de la familia en terminar la escuela tengo fe que será profesional”.
Virginia junto a su marido pastean el ganado todos los días su labor comienza con los rayos de sol y termina al anochecer.
La señora Virginia planea producir derivados de la leche como queso, yogurt, nata, etc. Y para eso necesita incrementar su producción de leche, por este motivo solicita el crédito para la compra de ganado vacuno.
texts.en:
Virginia is a woman of 40 with a son of 19. She lives in the area of Batallas, two hours from the city of La Paz. She works in milk production, an activity that she has been doing since she was a girl, since her mother taught her this business. Her son finished his secondary school studies, and now he is in the military. "My son is the first one in the family to finish school. I have faith that he will be a professional." 

Virginia, along with her husband, takes their cattle to pasture every day. Her work begins with the rays of the sun and ends at dusk.

Señora Virginia plans to produce milk derivatives such as cheese, yogurt, cream, etc., and to do this she needs to increase her production of milk. For this reason, she is applying for the loan to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, beans, corn, and bread.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Roly

texts.es: Roly es casado y tiene un hijo Roly vive en El Alto en una casa de adobe junto a sus padres  Roly trabaja como chofer  y necesita un prestamo para comprar un motor  Roly es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Roly is married and has one son. Roly lives in El Alto in an adobe house together with his parents. Roly works as a driver and needs a loan to buy a motor. Roly is the only source of income in his home and for this reason he needs your help.

loans.use: to buy a motor

loans.name: Otgontugs

texts.en: Mr. Otgontugs is 44 years old and lives with his wife in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has worked at the Ulaanbaatar Railway Station for 18 years. He is requesting 4,000,000 MNT to renovate his older brother's apartment, which was built in 1983. If he renovates his brother's apartment, his single older brother will always feel comfort and love in his home. It is only thanks to you, dear lenders.

loans.use: to buy some necessary building materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new computer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase firewood and corn.

loans.name: Cesar Patricio

texts.es: Patricio es un señor trabajador que se dedica a trabajar de albañil y también tiene su negocio de crianza de chanchos, el es casado y tiene dos hijos de 6 y 8 años de edad que están asistiendo a la escuela, comenta Patricio que su esposa la ayuda en el cuidado de sus animales, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos para incrementar su negocio y con el que aspira seguir educando a sus hijos y mediante el arduo trabajo diario lograr construir una casa ya  que vive en la casa de sus suegros.
texts.en: Patricio is a hardworking man who makes a living working as a bricklayer and also has a business raising pigs. He is married and has two children ages 6 and 8 years old who are attending school. Patricio comments that his wife helps him take care of the animals. He will invest the loan to buy pigs to grow his business and with this he aspires to continue educating his children and through arduous daily work succeed in constructing a house, since he currently lives in the house of his in-laws.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Segundo Nestor
